title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\NetworkConfig
name: NetworkConfig
description:
NetworkConfig reports the relative names of network & subnetwork.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.NetworkConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.network
params.description: Output only. The relative name of the Google Compute Engine [network]google.container.v1.NetworkConfig.network to which the cluster is connected. Example: projects/my-project/global/networks/my-network

params.name: data.subnetwork
params.description: Output only. The relative name of the Google Compute Engine subnetwork to which the cluster is connected. Example: projects/my-project/regions/us-central1/subnetworks/my-subnet

params.name: data.enable_intra_node_visibility
params.description: Whether Intra-node visibility is enabled for this cluster. This makes same node pod to pod traffic visible for VPC network.

methods.name: getNetwork
methods.description:
Output only. The relative name of the Google Compute Engine [network]google.container.v1.NetworkConfig.network to which the cluster is connected.

Example: projects/my-project/global/networks/my-network

Generated from protobuf field string network = 1;

methods.description:

Example: projects/my-project/regions/us-central1/subnetworks/my-subnet

Generated from protobuf field string subnetwork = 2;

methods.name: getEnableIntraNodeVisibility
methods.description:
Whether Intra-node visibility is enabled for this cluster.

This makes same node pod to pod traffic visible for VPC network.

Generated from protobuf field bool enable_intra_node_visibility = 5;
